projects.name: MERN Tasks
projects.description: Project developed using a MERN stack which processes CRUD operations from a MongoDB that is connected remotely. In this project, you can register projects and its tasks which are managed by user. Authentication used for this project was developed using a JSON Web Token to restrict the operations that can be made by each user.

projects.name: Drinks recipes
projects.description: Drinks recipes project establishes a connection with an API from thecocktaildb.com for getting a list of recipes. Recipes received from the API are shown in modals by clicking on the main card of selected drink. This project was developed using ReactJS and using hooks like useContext and useEffect.

projects.name: Products Inventory
projects.description: Application developed using ReactJS and Redux for executing CRUD operations in a fake DB generated by a JSON file. CRUD operations are made requesting an API and results are displayed as alerts.

projects.name: Cotizador de CriptoMonedas
projects.description: One of the simplest projects that I have developed, it works consumming an API which provide information in real time about cryptocurrencies. You can choose your main fiat coin and get the equivalent value in a crypto coin.

projects.name: Images browser
projects.description: This project gets images from Pixabay's API. When data was received, it is shown as a card listed in main page and you can get the image selected by clicking it.
